Detailed Description

template<typename P>
class geometry::geometry_traits< P >

Helper class for derived classes or algorithms to conveniently define member characteristics.

Defines the following:

  • point_type
  • coordinate_type
  • coordinate_count (size_t) Linestring, polygon, etc can be derived from this class and, hence, define these characteristics
    Template parameters:
  • P point type
